original_text: I told my prophets to speak my message and my commands. I punished your ancestors, as I warned them I would do. Then they turned back to me. They said, “The Lord Almighty has punished us for our sins, as he said he would do.” ’
korean_text: 내가 나의 종 선지자들에게 명령한 내 말과 내 법도들이 어찌 너희 조상들에게 임하지 아니하였느냐 그러므로 그들이 돌이켜 이르기를 만군의 여호와께서 우리 길대로, 우리 행위대로 우리에게 행하시려고 뜻하신 것을 우리에게 행하셨도다 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: I told my prophets to speak my message
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 나의 예언자들에게 나의 메시지를 말하라고 명령했다

sentences.original_text: as I warned them I would do.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 경고했던 대로 그렇게 하겠다고 했다

sentences.original_text: Then they turned back to me.
has punished us for our sins
as he said he would do."
